messages.subject: BEWARE : Please Ignore Invite to Grouply .
messages.msgSnippet: Just a note to warn about this GRouply site. If you have contacted me directly before via email, this means you ll be on my Yahoo contact list. So if you get
messages.messageBody:
Just a note to warn about this GRouply site. If you have contacted
me directly before via email, this means you'll be on my Yahoo
contact list. So if you get any invite to join this Grouply thing,
seemingly coming from me lyeping2607@..., PLEASE IGNORE IT!!!

IT DIDN'T COME FROM ME!!!

I am getting very stressed out of this whole incident. I thought
I've posted this warning on unschoolingbasic this afternoon but I
can't see it here so I'm re-posting it again. So please bear with me
if this is a double posting.

If anyone on this list had contacted me via email, chances are
you'll be in my inbox contact list. Please ignore any Grouply invite
that turns up on your inbox presumbly sent by me under my previous
Yahoo ID lyeping2607@.... I didn't send this.

I was sent an invite to join this Grouply thing s few days ago from
someone in this group, needless to say, I really thought it was a
genuine invite, but it turn out to be not, as the same must have
happened to her too. I was advised to quickly unregister from
Grouply, and change my yahoo password, which I did. And now, I
can't get back into my yahoo mail box. It doesn't recognised my new
password, nor the old one. After numerous attempt, I'm totally
logged out of my yahoo account for 24 hours, twice in a row !!!!
AAArrrrrggg!!!

I can't even retrive my password for yahoo seems to not recognised
my answer to the name of my pet!!!

Very frustrating. I have to get a new yahoo account, and I've lost
all my contact list. Yes, very very frustrating!!!

SharonBUgs.

Lastest- I've just ound out I can't get into my blog because my
yahoo id didn't exist. Seems like something has deleted me off
yahoo's list LOL!!
